cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.0.0)
project(tryCarlac VERSION 0.1.0 LANGUAGES C CXX)

# include(CTest)
# enable_testing()
# set(CPACK_PROJECT_NAME ${PROJECT_NAME})
# set(CPACK_PROJECT_VERSION ${PROJECT_VERSION})
# include(CPack)

# Automatically generated by Setup.sh

add_definitions(-DBOOST_ERROR_CODE_HEADER_ONLY)

if (CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE STREQUAL "Server")
  add_definitions(-DASIO_NO_EXCEPTIONS)
  add_definitions(-DBOOST_NO_EXCEPTIONS)
  add_definitions(-DLIBCARLA_NO_EXCEPTIONS)
  add_definitions(-DPUGIXML_NO_EXCEPTIONS)
endif ()

# build/CMakeLists.txt.in
add_definitions(-DBOOST_ERROR_CODE_HEADER_ONLY) 
add_definitions(-DLIBCARLA_TEST_CONTENT_FOLDER="/home/typhon/repos/tryCarlac/third-party/test-content")
set(BOOST_INCLUDE_PATH "/home/typhon/repos/tryCarlac/third-party/boost-1.80.0-c10-install/include")
add_definitions(-DLIBCARLA_TEST_CONTENT_FOLDER="/home/typhon/repos/tryCarlac/third-party/test-content") 
set(BOOST_INCLUDE_PATH "/home/typhon/repos/tryCarlac/third-party/boost-1.80.0-c10-install/include") 
set(RPCLIB_INCLUDE_PATH "/home/typhon/repos/tryCarlac/third-party/rpclib-v2.2.1_c5-c10-libstdcxx-install/include") 
set(RPCLIB_LIB_PATH "/home/typhon/repos/tryCarlac/third-party/rpclib-v2.2.1_c5-c10-libstdcxx-install/lib") 
set(GTEST_INCLUDE_PATH "/home/typhon/repos/tryCarlac/third-party/gtest-1.8.1-c10-libstdcxx-install/include") 
set(GTEST_LIB_PATH "/home/typhon/repos/tryCarlac/third-party/gtest-1.8.1-c10-libstdcxx-install/lib") 
set(BOOST_LIB_PATH "/home/typhon/repos/tryCarlac/third-party/boost-1.80.0-c10-install/lib") 
set(RECAST_INCLUDE_PATH "/home/typhon/repos/tryCarlac/third-party/recast-0b13b0-c10-install/include") 
set(RECAST_LIB_PATH "/home/typhon/repos/tryCarlac/third-party/recast-0b13b0-c10-install/lib") 
set(LIBPNG_INCLUDE_PATH "/home/typhon/repos/tryCarlac/third-party/libpng-1.6.37-install/include/") 
set(LIBPNG_LIB_PATH "/home/typhon/repos/tryCarlac/third-party/libpng-1.6.37-install/lib")
set(CARLA_LIB_PATH "/home/typhon/repos/tryCarlac/LibCarla/source/tryapi")
set(CARLA_INCLUDE_PATH "/home/typhon/repos/tryCarlac/libcarla-install/include")

add_definitions(-DLIBCARLA_IMAGE_WITH_PNG_SUPPORT=true) 

set(CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE "Client")
add_subdirectory("LibCarla/cmake")
